ERRORS.INVALID_BASKET_AMOUNT_AMOUNT: You need to fill both min and max basket amount
ERRORS.INVALID_BASKET_AMOUNT_FEE_SOURCE: You need to fill basket amount source
ERRORS.INVALID_MAXIMUM_BASKET_AMOUNT_AMOUNT: Amount can either be 0 or more than min basket amount
ERRORS.INVALID_ZONE_BASED_BASKET_AMOUNT: You need to fill both min and max basket amount for all levels
